2013-14 Men's Ice Hockey Roster

23 Scott Wilson

Position Forward

Ht./Wt. 6-0 / 173

Class Junior

Hometown Oakville, Ont.

Highschool White Oaks Secondary School

Major Undeclared Business

Bio

Stats

Historical

Biography

MEDIA

Hockey's Future: Wilson looking to second half breakout for UMass Lowell

Lowell Sun: UML freshman Scott Wilson has made his presence felt

Boston Herald: Wilson, UML making noise

2013-14 - Junior Year

Added a goal and an assist in wins against New Hampshire and Penn State.

2012-13 - Sophomore Year

Hockey East Tournament Championship All-Tournament Team ... Scored the game-winning goal in UMass Lowell's 2-1 win over Providence in the Hockey East Tournament semifinal; and assisted on the game-winner in the 1-0 win over Boston University in the Championship game ... Named Hockey East Player of the Week on Jan. 14 after scoring three goals and dishing two assists in a 4-2/6-3 sweep at Vermont ... Playd in all 38 games with 15-19-34 ... Ranks among Hockey East leaders in scoring (tied for 10th), goal scoring (t-10th), power play points (6-7-13, tied for sixth), game-winning goals (t-third, four).

2011-12 - Freshman Year

Appeared in 37 games with 38 points (16g, 22a) and 26 penalty minutes ... Led all UML rookies in points, goals and assists ... Ranked second in the NCAA in points per game (1.03) among rookies ... Led all Hockey East freshman in league play with 28 points, ranked sixth among all league skaters ... Tallied an assist in his collegiate debut at Minnesota State (10/14) ... Scored a goal and two assists in the 7-1 win over Boston University (11/5) ... Had two points (1g, 1a), including the game-winning goal, in the 5-3 win at Maine (11/11) ... Scored two goals in the 4-0 shutout of Northeastern (1/20) ... Tallied three points (1g, 2a) in the 6-4 win over Vermont (2/4) ... Totaled 11 multi-point games ... Named the Hockey East Player of the Week five times: Nov. 7 (1g, 2a, +3), Nov. 14 (2g, 1a), Jan. 21 (3g, 1a, +3), Feb. 6 (2g, 3a, +5) and Feb. 20 (2g, 1a, +3) ... Named the Hockey East Rookie of the Year and a unanimous selection to the All-Rookie Team ... Recipient of the New England Hockey Writers George C. Carens Rookie of the Year Award.

Before UMass Lowell

Selected with the 28th pick (209th overall) in the seventh round by the Pittsburgh Penguins in the 2011 NHL Entry Draft... Played two seasons for Georgetown Raiders of the Ontario Professional Hockey League... Played 42 games while scoring 61 points (20g, 41a) in 2010-11... Tallied 84 points (33g, 51a) in 67 games in 2009-10... Was rookie and team player of the year...

Personal

Scott Stephen Wilson was born on April 24, 1992 in Oakville, Ontario... Son of Cathy and Steve Wilson...Has a younger sister Kendyl... Names Jonathan Toews and Michael Peca as his favorite sports figures... Favorite teams are Toronto Maple Leafs and Cleveland Browns... Hobbies include golf, boating and music...Choose UML because of the education and playing in Hockey East... Nick name is "Willy"...Enrolled in the College of Management, undecided on a major.
